abstract: Bluetooth headphones are becoming more popular, and the Insignia player promises stereo playback through compatible devices.
snippet: Bluetooth headphones are becoming more popular, and the Insignia player promises stereo playback through compatible devices.
lead_paragraph: Tiny MP3 players are a dime a dozen nowadays  but how many have Bluetooth? The Insignia 4-Gigabyte Player can transmit stereo MP3 music and video soundtracks to a pair of headphones over a wireless Bluetooth connection.

headline.main: An MP3 Player With Bluetooth: Look, Ma, Stereo but No Wires
headline.print_headline: An MP3 Player With Bluetooth: Look, Ma, Stereo but No Wires
